caption.p: ( a) Excitation (λ em = 615 nm) and ( b) emission (λ ex = 393.5 nm) spectra of Rb 2Eu(PO 4)(MoO 4) at 77 and 500 K temperature. ( c) Calculation of TQ 1/2 value for the sample doped with 100% Eu 3+ from normalized emission integral intensity. ( d) Temperature-dependent photoluminescence (PL) lifetimes (τ 1/e) of Rb 2Bi(PO 4)(MoO 4) doped with 1%, 50%, and 100% Eu 3+.
